# vx

> Universal Development Tool Manager — One command to rule them all with zero setup and zero learning curve.

vx is a Rust-based tool manager that automatically installs and manages development tools. Built for the AI-native era following Unix Philosophy and Scriptability principles, it enables developers and AI agents to use any tool without environment setup.

- **Install**: `curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/loonghao/vx/main/install.sh | bash` (Linux/macOS) or `irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/loonghao/vx/main/install.ps1 | iex` (Windows)
- **Platforms**: Windows, macOS, Linux
- **Rust**: 1.83+
- **License**: MIT
- **Repository**: https://github.com/loonghao/vx

## Key Features

- Zero learning curve — use existing commands with `vx` prefix
- Auto-install tools on first use
- Multi-language support (Node.js, Python, Go, Rust, Java, Zig, etc.)
- Project configuration via `vx.toml`
- Team environment synchronization with `vx setup`
- MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration ready
- Shell integration for bash, zsh, fish, PowerShell
- 50+ built-in tool providers
- Implicit package execution (e.g., `vx vite dev` without global install)
- Proxy-managed runtimes for ecosystem tools

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/getting-started.md): Quick start guide
- [Installation](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/installation.md): Installation instructions
- [Core Concepts](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/concepts.md): Core concepts and terminology
- [Configuration](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/configuration.md): vx.toml configuration guide
- [Direct Execution](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/direct-execution.md): Run tools directly with vx
- [Project Environments](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/project-environments.md): Team development environments
- [Version Management](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/version-management.md): Version selection and switching
- [Shell Integration](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/guide/shell-integration.md): Shell setup and completions

## CLI Reference

- [CLI Overview](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/overview.md): Command overview
- [Commands Reference](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/commands.md): Full command reference
- [vx run](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/run.md): Run scripts defined in vx.toml
- [vx setup](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/setup.md): Setup project environment
- [vx dev](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/dev.md): Development shell
- [vx install](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/install.md): Install tools
- [vx list](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/list.md): List available tools
- [vx global](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/global.md): Global tool management
- [vx info](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/info.md): Tool information
- [Implicit Package Execution](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/implicit-package-execution.md): Run packages without global install

## Tools

- [Tools Overview](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/overview.md): All supported tools
- [Node.js](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/nodejs.md): node, npm, npx
- [Python](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/python.md): uv, uvx, python
- [Go](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/go.md): go toolchain
- [Rust](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/rust.md): cargo, rustc, rustup
- [Build Tools](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/build-tools.md): cmake, ninja, just, task
- [DevOps](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/devops.md): terraform, kubectl, helm
- [Cloud](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/cloud.md): aws, az, gcloud
